title: Mirko Ilic
description: Bosnian-born designer and illustrator Mirko Ilic discusses his early career behind the iron curtain, his prolific drawing and his current career in New York.
itunes:subtitle: Bosnian-born designer  and illustrator Mirko Ilic discusses his early career behind  the iron curtain, his prolific drawing and his current career in New York.
